subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter A. J. Pierzynski tied a White Sox record by homering in his fifth consecutive game, a two-run drive in the seventh inning that led Chicago over the Los Angeles Angels.
snippet: Pinch-hitter A. J. Pierzynski tied a White Sox record by homering in his fifth consecutive game, a two-run drive in the seventh inning that led Chicago over the Los Angeles Angels.
